short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Re-imagine the way you Surf on Google

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are re-imagining search by making websites more important and letting our users prioritize and collate whatâ€™s important to them with Surfboards.

Troubleshoot anything with a forum on every website on Google.

Collaborate with others to figure stuff out.

Access millions of users, able to share in independent and public information.

Pin and order all of your favorite places online in one great space, with Surfboards.

Speed up your Surfing and avoid tab anxiety in keeping all your tabs open, slowing down your computer's performance. Now you can pin it to Surfboards and come back when you need it...

Avoid scammers or bad business with a snapshot of a business in every search.

Surf creates revenue through businesses and NOT by exploiting your data.

And of course, there's  "real" dark mode.
